titles.title: Expressing sympathy for and solidarity with the people of the Russian Federation following the bombing of the Nevsky Express.
Expressing sympathy for and solidarity with the people of the Russian Federation following the bombing of the Nevsky Express.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary:
Expresses sympathy for, and solidarity with, the people of the Russian Federation following the bombing of the Nevsky Express.
Condemns all acts of terrorism.
